title: Ensure 'Accounts: Administrator account status' is set to 'Disabled'
description: The built-in Administrator account should be disabled to prevent unauthorized access.

title: Ensure 'Accounts: Guest account status' is set to 'Disabled'
description: The Guest account should be disabled.

title: Ensure Windows Firewall: Domain Profile is enabled
description: Windows Firewall should be enabled for the Domain profile.

title: Ensure Windows Firewall: Private Profile is enabled
description: Windows Firewall should be enabled for the Private profile.

title: Ensure Windows Firewall: Public Profile is enabled
description: Windows Firewall should be enabled for the Public profile.

title: Ensure 'Include command line in process creation events' is enabled
description: Command line audit logging helps with forensic investigation.

title: Ensure 'Access this computer from the network' is configured
description: This setting determines which users can connect to the computer from the network.

title: Ensure BitLocker uses appropriate encryption method
Ensure 'Print Spooler' service is disabled
description: The Print Spooler service should be disabled if not needed to prevent PrintNightmare exploits.

title: Ensure 'Enable RDP' is set correctly
description: Remote Desktop should be disabled if not required.
